message:
Booking Created:

Booking Ref : {{ doc.name }}

This is a notification for a Booking that was created today, and a sample Email Alert. In ERPNext you can setup email alerts on anything, Invoices, Orders, Leads, Opportunities, so you never miss a thing.
To edit this, and setup other alerts, just type Email Alert in the search bar.
